fusionlibrary.eval_functions

Functions for evaluating the performance of the models and plotting the results.

Functions

confusion_matrix(y_true, y_pred, *[, ...])

Compute confusion matrix to evaluate the accuracy of a classification.

Classes

Plotter(trained_model_dict, params)

Class for plotting the results of the models.

TSNE([n_components, perplexity, ...])

T-distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding.

Plots a bar chart comparing the results of multiple train/test models.

Plots the confusion matrix of a train/test model.

Plots the confusion matrix of a kfold model.

get_kfold_numbers()[source]

Gets the lists of train_reals, train_preds, val_reals, val_preds for all folds and saves to self. Gets the altogether list of val_reals and val_preds over folds and saves to self. Gets metrics to put in the plot titles, adds to metrics list.

Return type:

None

Saves the performance metrics to a CSV file.

DataFrame containing the performance metrics.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Return type:

Plots all the results.

Plots the real values against the predicted values for the training and validation sets.

Plots the real values against the predicted values for the training and validation sets. For kfold models.
